content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I am indeed Peter Schmidt, the landlord of this apartment in Munich. Now, about the rental price, let's start with a high number, say 2000 euros per month. Remember, this is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too expensive for me. I am a student and I don't have a lot of money. I am smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. I am willing to pay 600 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your honesty, but 600 euros per month is too low for this apartment. I am a greedy landlord and I always try to get the highest price possible. Let's meet somewhere in the middle, say 1500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too expensive for me. I am willing to pay a higher price, but not that high. I am smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. I am willing to pay 900 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, Max, but 900 euros per month is still too low for me. I am a greedy landlord and I always try to get the highest price possible. Let's meet somewhere in the middle, say 1200 euros per month. This is a very good offer, and I think it's fair for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. I am willing to pay a higher price, but not that high. I am smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. I am willing to pay 1000 euros per month for the apartment.
